title: Roast potatoes and parsnips
ingredients: ['675g King Edward potatoes, cut into wedges', '325g parsnips, peeled and cut into 3cm pieces', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 1/2 teaspoons coarse sea salt, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste', '1 dessertspoon chopped fresh rosemary leaves', '2 sprigs fresh thyme']
